But Satan had too much at stake to lightly give up the battle. He knew that, if Christ came off victor, his influence would be lessened. So, in order to awe Christ with his superior strength, he carried him to Jerusalem and placed him on a pinnacle of the temple. He now demanded that, if he were indeed the Son of God, 
                                                                           94
he should cast himself from that dizzy height, and thus indicate entire confidence in his Father's preserving care.
